comments:
version 3.3.0 - Build id: I20070320-0010

scenario:
start on any (existing / new) workspace,
window --> show view --> Error Log
Right-click in the Error Log view

--> no pop-up menu, due to a NPE, visible in the console -I'll put the stack below.

Not reproduced using a M5 build
